Posts.Content: Hi Sam'  My mums got cancer in her stomach and liver shes on her 3 chemo was only 10 days ago. My mum hasnt been feeling well for the last 3days its the worst shes felt out of all the chemos. Feeling sick. Shaking and feeling cold and her side hurts were her kidney is. So it could be side affects from chemo  Demi xx
Posts.Title: Pain after 1st cycle of chemo? HELP
